00037 #include "egs_track_scoring.h"
00038 #include "egs_input.h"
00039 #include "egs_functions.h"
00040 
00041 EGS_TrackScoring::EGS_TrackScoring(const string &Name, EGS_ObjectFactory *f) :
00042     EGS_AusgabObject(Name,f), m_pts(0), m_start(0), m_stop(1024), m_lastCase(-1),
00043     m_nScore(0), m_bufSize(16), m_score(false), m_didScore(false),
00044     m_score_photons(true), m_score_electrons(true), m_score_positrons(true), m_fnExtra("") {
00045     otype = "EGS_TrackScoring";
00046 }
00047 
00048 EGS_TrackScoring::~EGS_TrackScoring() {
00049     if( m_pts ) delete m_pts;
00050 }
00051 
00052 void EGS_TrackScoring::setApplication(EGS_Application *App) {
00053     EGS_AusgabObject::setApplication(App);
00054     if( !app ) return;
00055     if( m_pts ) { delete m_pts; m_pts = 0; }
00056     if( m_bufSize < 1 ) m_bufSize = 1024;
00057     string fname(app->getOutputFile()); fname += m_fnExtra;
00058     if( !egsIsAbsolutePath(fname) ) fname = egsJoinPath(app->getAppDir(),fname);
00059     int i_parallel = -1;
00060     if( app->getNparallel() > 1 ) i_parallel = app->getIparallel();
00061     if( i_parallel >= 0 ) {
00062         char buf[16]; sprintf(buf,"_w%d",i_parallel); fname += buf;
00063     }
00064     fname += ".ptracks";
00065     m_pts = new EGS_ParticleTrackContainer(fname.c_str(),m_bufSize);
00066 
00067     description = "\nParticle Track Scoring (";
00068     description += name; description += ")\n";
00069     description += "======================================================\n";
00070     description += " - Scoring photon tracks       = ";
00071     description += m_score_photons ? "YES\n" : "NO\n";
00072     description += " - Scoring electron tracks     = ";
00073     description += m_score_electrons ? "YES\n" : "NO\n";
00074     description += " - Scoring positron tracks     = ";
00075     description += m_score_positrons ? "YES\n" : "NO\n";
00076     description += " - First event to score        = ";
00077     char buf[32];
00078     sprintf(buf,"%lld\n",m_start); description += buf;
00079     description += " - Last event to score         = ";
00080     sprintf(buf,"%lld\n",m_stop); description += buf;
00081     description += " - Track buffer size           = ";
00082     sprintf(buf,"%d\n",m_bufSize); description += buf;
00083     description += " - Output file name            = "; description += fname;
00084     description += "\n\n";
00085 }
00086 
00087 void EGS_TrackScoring::reportResults() {
00088     egsInformation("\nParticle Track Scoring (%s)\n",name.c_str());
00089     egsInformation("======================================================\n");
00090     egsInformation("   Total events scored:     %lld\n",m_nScore);
00091     if( m_pts ) m_pts->reportResults(false);
00092 }

00095 extern "C" {
00096 
00097 EGS_TRACK_SCORING_EXPORT EGS_AusgabObject* createAusgabObject(EGS_Input *input,
00098         EGS_ObjectFactory *f) {
00099     const static char *func = "createAusgabObject(track_scoring)";
00100     if( !input ) {
00101         egsWarning("%s: null input?\n",func); return 0;
00102     }
00103     vector<string> sc_options; sc_options.push_back("no"); sc_options.push_back("yes");
00104     bool scph = input->getInput("score photons",sc_options,true);
00105     bool scel = input->getInput("score electrons",sc_options,true);
00106     bool scpo = input->getInput("score positrons",sc_options,true);
00107     if( !scph && !scel && !scpo ) return 0;
00108     EGS_I64 first = 0, last = 1024;
00109     input->getInput("start scoring",first); input->getInput("stop scoring",last);
00110     int bufSize = 1024;  input->getInput("buffer size",bufSize);
00111     string fnExtra; input->getInput("file name addition",fnExtra);
00112     EGS_TrackScoring *result = new EGS_TrackScoring("",f);
00113     result->setScorePhotons(scph);
00114     result->setScoreElectrons(scel);
00115     result->setScorePositrons(scpo);
00116     result->setFirstEvent(first);
00117     result->setLastEvent(last);
00118     result->setBufferSize(bufSize);
00119     result->setFileNameExtra(fnExtra);
00120     result->setName(input);
00121     return result;
00122 }
00123 
00124 }
